SourceProxy.label: Temporal CSV Reader
SourceProxy.name: TemporalCSVReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a temporal Delimited Text values file into a 1D rectilinear grid.
Documentation.short_help: Read a temporal Delimited Text values file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The temporal Delimited text reader reads a Delimited Text values file into a 1D rectilinear grid. A user defined column is used as time step indicator. On a given time step s, only the lines having this column at the value s are kept. The default file extensions are .csv, .tcsv, .txt.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the temporal CSV (Command Separated Values) reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: FieldDelimiterCharacters
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists the characters that may be used to separate fields. For example, a value of "," indicates a comma-separated value file. A value of ".:;" indicates that columns may be separated by a period, colon or semicolon. The order of the characters in the text string does not matter.

IntVectorProperty.name: AddTabFieldDelimiter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether to add the tab character as a field delimiter to the list of other delimiter characters. This is needed since in the GUI the user can't enter a tab character.

IntVectorProperty.name: MergeConsecutiveDelimiters
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Whether to merge successive delimiters. Use this if (for example) your fields are separated by spaces but you don't know exactly how many.

IntVectorProperty.name: HaveHeaders
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If the value of this property is 1, treat the first line of the file as headers. Otherwise, column are named using their position with the following pattern: "Field [num]" starting at 0. Use this name to define the temporal indicator.

StringVectorProperty.name: TimeColumnName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the name of the column to use as time indicator.

IntVectorProperty.name: RemoveTimeStepColumn
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies wether or not to keep the column chosen as time step indicator in the output.

ReaderFactory.extensions: csv trco tsv txt CSV TSV TXT
